title: Filibuster Principle
keywords: filibuster filibusters don't use it compromise compromises partisanship politics partisan bi-partisanship bipartisanship bi-partisan bipartisan Senator John McCain Senator Harry Reid senators politician politicians democrat democrats republican republicans Cartoonist Group Creators Syndicate Akron Beacon-Journal
caption: We agreed to preserve the principle of the filibuster.  As long as they don't use it.
